sourcesContent:
Reel Reflection

Interview Test

Below are the tasks accomplised - Within this assessment

  • Created a backend api using .Net
  • Implemented Xunit test for the backend
  • Create a frontend webclient using angular and tailwind css
  • Implemented search for movie by title
  • Implemented get movie by Id
  • Persist last 5 search history for the lifetime of the app, (No Database used)

I decided to name the application ReelReflection seeing it's the best name i could come up with :).

Search for a movie
